``DefaultStackTraceMsgBuilder`` (Aspect)
========================================

**Brief Description:** DefaultStackTraceMsgBuilder is the default implementation of the StackTraceMsgBuilder interface.

**Detailed Description:**

    This aspect staticly configures the implementation of the function form the interface during compilation.

*In file* ``src/error_handling/default_stack_trace_msg_builder.ah``

.. _default_stack_trace_msg_builder_ah_build_msg:

``build_msg`` (Advice)
----------------------

*See:* :ref:`acp::stack_trace_msg_builder::build_msg <stack_trace_msg_builder_hh_build_msg>`
